Message:
Indeed, even the mightiest
have the mightiest of worries.

Back then, while some sought to
exterminate me as a mononoke,
others worshipped me, saying,
“Dear guardian spirit...”

’Twas troubling how attitudes were
completely different person to person.

Well, ’twas the same for me.
I cannot tell one human from another.
But, I was the mightiest...the wisest.
